ValidationRule.description: Early Pay Tiers can be deleted, but values cannot be edited.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL(Election__c, 'Monthly Payment (10th of the month) - 6 basis points (0.06%)') && OR( SBQQ__LowerBound__c <> 0, SBQQ__UpperBound__c <> 6, Basis_Points__c <> 6 )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Early Pay Tiers can be deleted, but values cannot be edited.
